scripts.e2e-test-check-tool:
/bin/bash -c 'if [[ -z $(which configtxgen) ]]; then echo "### Need to install tools ###
"; exit -1; fi'
scripts.e2e-test-check-img:
/bin/bash -c 'if [[ -z $(docker images -q hyperledger/fabric-peer:latest) ]]; then echo "### Need to pull fabric images ###
"; exit -1; fi'
scripts.e2e-test-setup-tool:ci: /bin/bash -c 'which configtxgen >/dev/null; if [[ $? -eq 0 ]] && [[ $(configtxgen -version | grep Version: | sed -e "s/^.*:\s*//") == "1.4.6" ]]; then echo Found; else echo Not found; curl -sSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/hyperledger/fabric/master/scripts/bootstrap.sh | bash -s -- 1.4.6 1.4.6 0.4.18 -s; fi'
scripts.e2e-test-build-src: npm install; cd client; npm install; npm run build
scripts.e2e-api-test: run-s e2e-test-check-tool e2e-test-check-img e2e-test-setup-img e2e-test-build-src e2e-api-test-run
scripts.e2e-api-test:ci: cross-env PATH=$PATH:$PWD/bin run-s e2e-test-setup-tool:ci e2e-test-check-tool e2e-test-setup-img e2e-test-build-src e2e-api-test-run
scripts.e2e-gui-test:ci: cross-env PATH=$PATH:$PWD/bin run-s e2e-test-setup-tool:ci e2e-test-check-tool e2e-test-setup-img e2e-test-build-src e2e-gui-test-run
